title: Successful login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using valid email/phone and password with correct role-based access.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter valid email/phone and valid password
Submit login form
Verify login is successful and user is redirected to the assigned role-based dashboard

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that logging in with invalid email or password returns an authentication error and prevents access.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid email or incorrect password
Submit login form
Verify error message is displayed and access is denied

title: Role-based dashboard data retrieval and display
description: Verify each user role (Super Admin, Admin, Manager, Employee, Intern) accesses their specific dashboard and sees correct KPIs and tasks.

steps.description: Login as Super Admin
Access Super Admin dashboard
Verify Super Admin dashboard shows correct data
Logout and login as Admin
Access Admin dashboard
Verify Admin dashboard shows correct data
Repeat for Manager, Employee, Intern roles
Each dashboard displays role-appropriate KPIs, tasks, and permissions

title: Monthly Tactical Updates submission with proof enforcement
description: Verify employees can submit monthly tactical updates only when all mandatory fields including KPI proofs and URL links are completed.

steps.description: Login as Employee
Navigate to Monthly Tactical Updates form
Fill out KPIs without proof URLs
Attempt to submit the update
Verify submission is blocked with validation error on proof URLs
Fill out all mandatory fields including valid proof URLs
Submit the update
Verify update submission is successful

title: Manager review of Monthly Tactical Updates including proof validation
description: Verify managers can review employee submissions, validate proofs, and view client NPS and project scope updates.

steps.description: Login as Manager
Access Monthly Tactical Updates dashboard
Verify employee updates are listed with proof URLs
Review an employee update and mark proof as valid or invalid
Verify status is saved correctly and reflected in reports
Verify client NPS scores and project scope updates are visible

title: Client onboarding and directory management
description: Verify admin can create new clients, complete onboarding, and verify client appears correctly in the client directory.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to Client Addition form
Submit new client details including name, email, and services
Verify client is created successfully with HTTP 201 response
Complete client onboarding process
Verify onboarding completion response success
Access Client Directory
Verify new client details are correctly listed

title: Employee signup and onboarding lifecycle
description: Verify new employees can be created, onboarded, and listed correctly in the employee directory.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Navigate to Employee SignUp form
Submit new employee details
Verify HTTP 201 Employee created response
Complete onboarding workflow for the new employee
Verify onboarding steps are completed successfully
Access Employee Directory
Verify new employee appears with correct information

title: Reporting system: fetch monthly tactical and quarterly strategic reports
description: Verify reports can be fetched via API and displayed properly in the UI for monthly tactical and quarterly strategic reports.

steps.description: Access Monthly Tactical Reports API endpoint
Verify successful retrieval of monthly tactical reports with HTTP 200
Access Quarterly Strategic Reports API endpoint
Verify successful retrieval of quarterly strategic reports with HTTP 200
Navigate to reporting dashboard UI
Verify reports data displayed correctly with proper charts and tables

title: Sales pipeline management: create, update and view leads
description: Verify sales leads can be added, retrieved, and updated properly with pipeline stage tracking and conversion metrics.

steps.description: Login as Sales user
Create a new sales lead with relevant details
Verify HTTP 201 response confirming lead creation
Retrieve list of sales leads
Verify leads list contains the newly created lead with correct details
Update the pipeline stage of the existing lead
Verify update is saved and reflected in lead details
Verify UI sales dashboard shows updated pipeline counts and conversion analytics

title: Payment Management: retrieve and update payment records with proof enforcement
description: Verify payment accounts can be retrieved, individual payments accessed and updated with proof attachments verified.

steps.description: Login as Accountant or Admin
Retrieve payment accounts list
Verify HTTP 200 and correct payment accounts data returned
Select a payment record and retrieve its details
Verify payment details include payment type, status, and proof attachments
Update the payment record with new status and add valid proof URLs
Verify successful update with HTTP 200 response and data accuracy
Attempt update without required proof URLs
Verify update is blocked with appropriate validation error

title: Notification system: retrieve notifications and mark as read
description: Verify notifications can be retrieved, displayed, and marked as read to update status properly.

steps.description: Login as any user
Retrieve notifications from API
Verify notifications are loaded with correct read/unread statuses
Mark a notification as read
Verify notification status updated to read in UI and API response

title: Role-based access control enforcement on UI and API
description: Verify that users are restricted to access only their authorized dashboards, data endpoints and UI features, with blocked unauthorized access logged.

steps.description: Login as Employee
Attempt to access Super Admin and Admin dashboards and APIs
Verify access denied response or UI block
Check audit logs for denied access attempts
Verify denied access events are captured with timestamp and user info

title: Audit logs capture data changes and views
description: Verify that all critical data changes and data views (including role permission modifications and report exports) are logged accurately and accessible to authorized users.

steps.description: Login as Admin
Perform data changes such as employee updates or client modifications
Verify audit logs record these changes with user, timestamp, and change details
Access audit logs interface
Verify logs for data views and changes are listed accurately

title: Employee appraisal delay enforcement due to learning non-compliance
description: Verify that employees with less than 6 learning hours have automatic delays imposed on their appraisal processing.

steps.description: Login as Manager
Review employee learning compliance report showing hours logged
Verify employees with <6 learning hours have appraisal delays flagged in system
Select an employee with non-compliance
Verify system prevents finalizing or proceeding with appraisal until compliance is met

title: Export of reports to PDF and CSV format within performance expectations
description: Verify that monthly and quarterly reports can be exported to PDF and CSV successfully within 10 seconds and exported data accuracy.

steps.description: Navigate to Reports dashboard
Select monthly tactical report and export as PDF
Verify export completes within 10 seconds and content matches report data
Export the same report as CSV
Verify CSV export completes within 10 seconds and data integrity is maintained
Repeat for quarterly strategic report

title: Authentication session persistence and secure token management
description: Verify user sessions persist after login with secure tokens and prevent unauthorized token reuse or session hijacking.

steps.description: Login with valid credentials and obtain session token
Verify session token is stored securely on client side and used for API requests
Close browser and reopen, verify user remains logged in if within session timeout
Verify session token remains valid and user retains role-based access
Attempt to reuse expired or invalid token for API access
Verify access is denied and token rejected

title: Accounts dashboard correctly distinguishes payment flows and statuses
description: Verify that the Accounts dashboard correctly categorizes retainer vs one-time payments and displays accurate payment statuses.

steps.description: Login as Accountant
Access Accounts dashboard
Verify retainer payments are listed under retained category with correct statuses
Verify one-time payments are listed separately with correct statuses
Verify payment statuses update correctly when payments are confirmed or pending

title: Gamification arcade point earning and redemption controls
description: Verify users can earn points through activity and redeem them properly with controls to prevent negative balances or invalid redemptions.

steps.description: Login as Employee or Freelancer
Perform activities that earn gamification points
Verify points awarded accurately in user's gamification account
Redeem points for available rewards
Verify points deducted correctly and redemption logged
Attempt to redeem points exceeding current balance
Verify redemption is blocked with appropriate error

title: Audit logging for data views and changes enforces accountability
description: Verify audit logs contain comprehensive records of data views and changes for accountability and traceability.

steps.description: Login as Admin
View sensitive data such as payment records, employee info, sales leads
Verify data views are recorded in audit logs with user id, timestamp, and data referenced
Modify data such as updating employee status or payment proof
Verify changes are logged with before and after values

title: System health endpoint returns expected status
description: Verify system health endpoint returns 200 HTTP status and correct healthy status response.

steps.description: Call /health API endpoint
Verify response code 200 and response indicates system health is good
